00019 /*
00020  * lustre/utils/liblustreapi_layout.c
00021  *
00022  * lustreapi library for layout calls for interacting with the layout of
00023  * Lustre files while hiding details of the internal data structures
00024  * from the user.
00025  *
00026  * Author: Ned Bass <bass6@llnl.gov>
00027  */
00028 
00029 #include <stdio.h>
00030 #include <fcntl.h>
00031 #include <stdlib.h>
00032 #include <unistd.h>
00033 #include <errno.h>
00034 #include <limits.h>
00035 #include <sys/xattr.h>
00036 
00037 #include <lustre/lustreapi.h>
00038 #include <lustre/lustre_idl.h>
00039 #include "lustreapi_internal.h"
00040 
00048 struct llapi_layout {
00049         uint32_t        llot_magic;
00050         uint64_t        llot_pattern;
00051         uint64_t        llot_stripe_size;
00052         uint64_t        llot_stripe_count;
00053         uint64_t        llot_stripe_offset;
00055         bool            llot_objects_are_valid;
00056         /* Add 1 so user always gets back a null terminated string. */
00057         char            llot_pool_name[LOV_MAXPOOLNAME + 1];
00058         struct          lov_user_ost_data_v1 llot_objects[0];
00059 };
00060 
00068 static void
00069 llapi_layout_swab_lov_user_md(struct lov_user_md *lum, int object_count)
00070 {
00071         int i;
00072         struct lov_user_md_v3 *lumv3 = (struct lov_user_md_v3 *)lum;
00073         struct lov_user_ost_data *lod;
00074 
00075         __swab32s(&lum->lmm_magic);
00076         __swab32s(&lum->lmm_pattern);
00077         __swab32s(&lum->lmm_stripe_size);
00078         __swab16s(&lum->lmm_stripe_count);
00079         __swab16s(&lum->lmm_stripe_offset);
00080 
00081         if (lum->lmm_magic != LOV_MAGIC_V1)
00082                 lod = lumv3->lmm_objects;
00083         else
00084                 lod = lum->lmm_objects;
00085 
00086         for (i = 0; i < object_count; i++)
00087                 __swab32s(&lod[i].l_ost_idx);
00088 }
00089 
00098 static struct llapi_layout *__llapi_layout_alloc(unsigned int num_stripes)
00099 {
00100         struct llapi_layout *layout = NULL;
00101         size_t size = sizeof(*layout) +
00102                 (num_stripes * sizeof(layout->llot_objects[0]));
00103 
00104         if (num_stripes > LOV_MAX_STRIPE_COUNT)
00105                 errno = EINVAL;
00106         else
00107                 layout = calloc(1, size);
00108 
00109         return layout;
00110 }
00111 
00122 static struct llapi_layout *
00123 llapi_layout_from_lum(const struct lov_user_md *lum, size_t object_count)
00124 {
00125         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00126         size_t objects_sz;
00127 
00128         objects_sz = object_count * sizeof(lum->lmm_objects[0]);
00129 
00130         layout = __llapi_layout_alloc(object_count);
00131         if (layout == NULL)
00132                 return NULL;
00133 
00134         layout->llot_magic = LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC;
00135 
00136         if (lum->lmm_pattern == LOV_PATTERN_RAID0)
00137                 layout->llot_pattern = LLAPI_LAYOUT_RAID0;
00138         else
00139                 /* Lustre only supports RAID0 for now. */
00140                 layout->llot_pattern = lum->lmm_pattern;
00141 
00142         if (lum->lmm_stripe_size == 0)
00143                 layout->llot_stripe_size = LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT;
00144         else
00145                 layout->llot_stripe_size = lum->lmm_stripe_size;
00146 
00147         if (lum->lmm_stripe_count == (typeof(lum->lmm_stripe_count))-1)
00148                 layout->llot_stripe_count = LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE;
00149         else if (lum->lmm_stripe_count == 0)
00150                 layout->llot_stripe_count = LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT;
00151         else
00152                 layout->llot_stripe_count = lum->lmm_stripe_count;
00153 
00154         /* Don't copy lmm_stripe_offset: it is always zero
00155          * when reading attributes. */
00156 
00157         if (lum->lmm_magic != LOV_USER_MAGIC_V1) {
00158                 const struct lov_user_md_v3 *lumv3;
00159                 lumv3 = (struct lov_user_md_v3 *)lum;
00160                 snprintf(layout->llot_pool_name, sizeof(layout->llot_pool_name),
00161                          "%s", lumv3->lmm_pool_name);
00162                 memcpy(layout->llot_objects, lumv3->lmm_objects, objects_sz);
00163         } else {
00164                 const struct lov_user_md_v1 *lumv1;
00165                 lumv1 = (struct lov_user_md_v1 *)lum;
00166                 memcpy(layout->llot_objects, lumv1->lmm_objects, objects_sz);
00167         }
00168         if (object_count > 0)
00169                 layout->llot_objects_are_valid = true;
00170 
00171         return layout;
00172 }
00173 
00188 static struct lov_user_md *
00189 llapi_layout_to_lum(const struct llapi_layout *layout)
00190 {
00191         struct lov_user_md *lum;
00192         size_t lum_size;
00193         uint32_t magic = LOV_USER_MAGIC_V1;
00194 
00195         if (strlen(layout->llot_pool_name) != 0)
00196                 magic = LOV_USER_MAGIC_V3;
00197 
00198         /* The lum->lmm_objects array won't be
00199          * sent to the kernel when we write the lum, so
00200          * we don't allocate storage for it.
00201          */
00202         lum_size = lov_user_md_size(0, magic);
00203         lum = malloc(lum_size);
00204         if (lum == NULL)
00205                 return NULL;
00206 
00207         lum->lmm_magic = magic;
00208 
00209         if (layout->llot_pattern == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT)
00210                 lum->lmm_pattern = 0;
00211         else if (layout->llot_pattern == LLAPI_LAYOUT_RAID0)
00212                 lum->lmm_pattern = 1;
00213         else
00214                 lum->lmm_pattern = layout->llot_pattern;
00215 
00216         if (layout->llot_stripe_size == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT)
00217                 lum->lmm_stripe_size = 0;
00218         else
00219                 lum->lmm_stripe_size = layout->llot_stripe_size;
00220 
00221         if (layout->llot_stripe_count == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT)
00222                 lum->lmm_stripe_count = 0;
00223         else if (layout->llot_stripe_count == LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE)
00224                 lum->lmm_stripe_count = -1;
00225         else
00226                 lum->lmm_stripe_count = layout->llot_stripe_count;
00227 
00228         if (layout->llot_stripe_offset == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT)
00229                 lum->lmm_stripe_offset = -1;
00230         else
00231                 lum->lmm_stripe_offset = layout->llot_stripe_offset;
00232 
00233         if (lum->lmm_magic != LOV_USER_MAGIC_V1) {
00234                 struct lov_user_md_v3 *lumv3 = (struct lov_user_md_v3 *)lum;
00235 
00236                 strncpy(lumv3->lmm_pool_name, layout->llot_pool_name,
00237                         sizeof(lumv3->lmm_pool_name));
00238         }
00239 
00240         return lum;
00241 }
00242 
00250 static void get_parent_dir(const char *path, char *buf, size_t size)
00251 {
00252         char *p;
00253 
00254         strncpy(buf, path, size);
00255         p = strrchr(buf, '/');
00256 
00257         if (p != NULL)
00258                 *p = '\0';
00259         else if (size >= 2)
00260                 strncpy(buf, ".", 2);
00261 }
00262 
00270 static void inherit_layout_attributes(const struct llapi_layout *src,
00271                                         struct llapi_layout *dest)
00272 {
00273         if (dest->llot_pattern == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT)
00274                 dest->llot_pattern = src->llot_pattern;
00275 
00276         if (dest->llot_stripe_size == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT)
00277                 dest->llot_stripe_size = src->llot_stripe_size;
00278 
00279         if (dest->llot_stripe_count == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT)
00280                 dest->llot_stripe_count = src->llot_stripe_count;
00281 }
00282 
00291 static bool is_fully_specified(const struct llapi_layout *layout)
00292 {
00293         return  layout->llot_pattern != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT &&
00294                 layout->llot_stripe_size != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT &&
00295                 layout->llot_stripe_count != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT;
00296 }
00297 
00304 struct llapi_layout *llapi_layout_alloc(void)
00305 {
00306         struct llapi_layout *layout;
00307 
00308         layout = __llapi_layout_alloc(0);
00309         if (layout == NULL)
00310                 return layout;
00311 
00312         /* Set defaults. */
00313         layout->llot_magic = LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC;
00314         layout->llot_pattern = LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT;
00315         layout->llot_stripe_size = LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT;
00316         layout->llot_stripe_count = LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT;
00317         layout->llot_stripe_offset = LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT;
00318         layout->llot_objects_are_valid = false;
00319         layout->llot_pool_name[0] = '\0';
00320 
00321         return layout;
00322 }
00323 
00334 static bool llapi_layout_lum_truncated(struct lov_user_md *lum, size_t lum_size)
00335 {
00336         uint32_t magic;
00337 
00338         if (lum_size < lov_user_md_size(0, LOV_MAGIC_V1))
00339                 return false;
00340 
00341         if (lum->lmm_magic == __swab32(LOV_MAGIC_V1) ||
00342             lum->lmm_magic == __swab32(LOV_MAGIC_V3))
00343                 magic = __swab32(lum->lmm_magic);
00344         else
00345                 magic = lum->lmm_magic;
00346 
00347         return lum_size < lov_user_md_size(0, magic);
00348 }
00349 
00359 static int llapi_layout_objects_in_lum(struct lov_user_md *lum, size_t lum_size)
00360 {
00361         uint32_t magic;
00362         size_t base_size;
00363 
00364         if (lum_size < lov_user_md_size(0, LOV_MAGIC_V1))
00365                 return 0;
00366 
00367         if (lum->lmm_magic == __swab32(LOV_MAGIC_V1) ||
00368             lum->lmm_magic == __swab32(LOV_MAGIC_V3))
00369                 magic = __swab32(lum->lmm_magic);
00370         else
00371                 magic = lum->lmm_magic;
00372 
00373         base_size = lov_user_md_size(0, magic);
00374 
00375         if (lum_size <= base_size)
00376                 return 0;
00377         else
00378                 return (lum_size - base_size) / sizeof(lum->lmm_objects[0]);
00379 }
00380 
00398 struct llapi_layout *llapi_layout_get_by_fd(int fd, uint32_t flags)
00399 {
00400         size_t lum_len;
00401         struct lov_user_md *lum;
00402         struct llapi_layout *layout = NULL;
00403         ssize_t bytes_read;
00404         int object_count;
00405         int lum_stripe_count;
00406         struct stat st;
00407         bool need_swab;
00408 
00409         lum_len = XATTR_SIZE_MAX;
00410         lum = malloc(lum_len);
00411         if (lum == NULL)
00412                 return NULL;
00413 
00414         bytes_read = fgetxattr(fd, XATTR_LUSTRE_LOV, lum, lum_len);
00415         if (bytes_read < 0) {
00416                 if (errno == EOPNOTSUPP)
00417                         errno = ENOTTY;
00418                 else if (errno == ENODATA)
00419                         layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00420                 goto out;
00421         }
00422 
00423         /* Return an error if we got back a partial layout. */
00424         if (llapi_layout_lum_truncated(lum, bytes_read)) {
00425                 errno = EINTR;
00426                 goto out;
00427         }
00428 
00429         object_count = llapi_layout_objects_in_lum(lum, bytes_read);
00430 
00431         need_swab = lum->lmm_magic == __swab32(LOV_MAGIC_V1) ||
00432                     lum->lmm_magic == __swab32(LOV_MAGIC_V3);
00433 
00434         if (need_swab)
00435                 lum_stripe_count = __swab16(lum->lmm_stripe_count);
00436         else
00437                 lum_stripe_count = lum->lmm_stripe_count;
00438 
00439         /* Directories may have a positive non-zero lum->lmm_stripe_count
00440          * yet have an empty lum->lmm_objects array. For non-directories the
00441          * amount of data returned from the kernel must be consistent
00442          * with the stripe count. */
00443         if (fstat(fd, &st) < 0)
00444                 goto out;
00445 
00446         if (!S_ISDIR(st.st_mode) && object_count != lum_stripe_count) {
00447                 errno = EINTR;
00448                 goto out;
00449         }
00450 
00451         if (need_swab)
00452                 llapi_layout_swab_lov_user_md(lum, object_count);
00453 
00454         layout = llapi_layout_from_lum(lum, object_count);
00455 
00456 out:
00457         free(lum);
00458         return layout;
00459 }
00460 
00482 static struct llapi_layout *llapi_layout_expected(const char *path)
00483 {
00484         struct llapi_layout     *path_layout = NULL;
00485         struct llapi_layout     *donor_layout;
00486         char                    donor_path[PATH_MAX];
00487         struct stat st;
00488         int fd;
00489         int rc;
00490 
00491         fd = open(path, O_RDONLY);
00492         if (fd < 0 && errno != ENOENT)
00493                 return NULL;
00494 
00495         if (fd >= 0) {
00496                 int tmp;
00497 
00498                 path_layout = llapi_layout_get_by_fd(fd, 0);
00499                 tmp = errno;
00500                 close(fd);
00501                 errno = tmp;
00502         }
00503 
00504         if (path_layout == NULL) {
00505                 if (errno != ENODATA && errno != ENOENT)
00506                         return NULL;
00507 
00508                 path_layout = llapi_layout_alloc();
00509                 if (path_layout == NULL)
00510                         return NULL;
00511         }
00512 
00513         if (is_fully_specified(path_layout))
00514                 return path_layout;
00515 
00516         rc = stat(path, &st);
00517         if (rc < 0 && errno != ENOENT) {
00518                 llapi_layout_free(path_layout);
00519                 return NULL;
00520         }
00521 
00522         /* If path is a not a directory or doesn't exist, inherit unspecified
00523          * attributes from parent directory. */
00524         if ((rc == 0 && !S_ISDIR(st.st_mode)) ||
00525             (rc < 0 && errno == ENOENT)) {
00526                 get_parent_dir(path, donor_path, sizeof(donor_path));
00527                 donor_layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(donor_path, 0);
00528                 if (donor_layout != NULL) {
00529                         inherit_layout_attributes(donor_layout, path_layout);
00530                         llapi_layout_free(donor_layout);
00531                         if (is_fully_specified(path_layout))
00532                                 return path_layout;
00533                 }
00534         }
00535 
00536         /* Inherit remaining unspecified attributes from the filesystem root. */
00537         rc = llapi_search_mounts(path, 0, donor_path, NULL);
00538         if (rc < 0) {
00539                 llapi_layout_free(path_layout);
00540                 return NULL;
00541         }
00542         donor_layout = llapi_layout_get_by_path(donor_path, 0);
00543         if (donor_layout == NULL) {
00544                 llapi_layout_free(path_layout);
00545                 return NULL;
00546         }
00547 
00548         inherit_layout_attributes(donor_layout, path_layout);
00549         llapi_layout_free(donor_layout);
00550 
00551         return path_layout;
00552 }
00553 
00567 struct llapi_layout *llapi_layout_get_by_path(const char *path, uint32_t flags)
00568 {
00569         struct llapi_layout *layout = NULL;
00570         int fd;
00571         int tmp;
00572 
00573         if (flags & LAYOUT_GET_EXPECTED)
00574                 return llapi_layout_expected(path);
00575 
00576         fd = open(path, O_RDONLY);
00577         if (fd < 0)
00578                 return layout;
00579 
00580         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_fd(fd, flags);
00581         tmp = errno;
00582         close(fd);
00583         errno = tmp;
00584 
00585         return layout;
00586 }
00587 
00597 struct llapi_layout *llapi_layout_get_by_fid(const char *lustre_dir,
00598                                              const lustre_fid *fid,
00599                                              uint32_t flags)
00600 {
00601         int fd;
00602         int tmp;
00603         int saved_msg_level = llapi_msg_get_level();
00604         struct llapi_layout *layout = NULL;
00605 
00606         /* Prevent llapi internal routines from writing to console
00607          * while executing this function, then restore previous message
00608          * level. */
00609         llapi_msg_set_level(LLAPI_MSG_OFF);
00610         fd = llapi_open_by_fid(lustre_dir, fid, O_RDONLY);
00611         llapi_msg_set_level(saved_msg_level);
00612 
00613         if (fd < 0)
00614                 return NULL;
00615 
00616         layout = llapi_layout_get_by_fd(fd, flags);
00617         tmp = errno;
00618         close(fd);
00619         errno = tmp;
00620 
00621         return layout;
00622 }
00623 
00625 void llapi_layout_free(struct llapi_layout *layout)
00626 {
00627         free(layout);
00628 }
00629 
00639 int llapi_layout_stripe_count_get(const struct llapi_layout *layout,
00640                                   uint64_t *count)
00641 {
00642         if (layout == NULL || count == NULL ||
00643             layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC) {
00644                 errno = EINVAL;
00645                 return -1;
00646         }
00647         *count = layout->llot_stripe_count;
00648         return 0;
00649 }
00650 
00651 /*
00652  * The llapi_layout API functions have these extra validity checks since
00653  * they use intuitively named macros to denote special behavior, whereas
00654  * the old API uses 0 and -1.
00655  */
00656 
00657 static bool llapi_layout_stripe_count_is_valid(int64_t stripe_count)
00658 {
00659         return stripe_count == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT ||
00660                 stripe_count == LLAPI_LAYOUT_WIDE ||
00661                 (stripe_count != 0 && stripe_count != -1 &&
00662                  llapi_stripe_count_is_valid(stripe_count));
00663 }
00664 
00665 static bool llapi_layout_stripe_size_is_valid(uint64_t stripe_size)
00666 {
00667         return stripe_size == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT ||
00668                 (stripe_size != 0 &&
00669                  llapi_stripe_size_is_aligned(stripe_size) &&
00670                  !llapi_stripe_size_is_too_big(stripe_size));
00671 }
00672 
00673 static bool llapi_layout_stripe_index_is_valid(int64_t stripe_index)
00674 {
00675         return stripe_index == LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT ||
00676                 (stripe_index >= 0 &&
00677                 llapi_stripe_index_is_valid(stripe_index));
00678 }
00679 
00689 int llapi_layout_stripe_count_set(struct llapi_layout *layout,
00690                                   uint64_t count)
00691 {
00692         if (layout == NULL || layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC ||
00693             !llapi_layout_stripe_count_is_valid(count)) {
00694                 errno = EINVAL;
00695                 return -1;
00696         }
00697 
00698         layout->llot_stripe_count = count;
00699 
00700         return 0;
00701 }
00702 
00712 int llapi_layout_stripe_size_get(const struct llapi_layout *layout,
00713                                  uint64_t *size)
00714 {
00715         if (layout == NULL || size == NULL ||
00716             layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC) {
00717                 errno = EINVAL;
00718                 return -1;
00719         }
00720 
00721         *size = layout->llot_stripe_size;
00722 
00723         return 0;
00724 }
00725 
00735 int llapi_layout_stripe_size_set(struct llapi_layout *layout,
00736                                  uint64_t size)
00737 {
00738         if (layout == NULL || layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC ||
00739             !llapi_layout_stripe_size_is_valid(size)) {
00740                 errno = EINVAL;
00741                 return -1;
00742         }
00743 
00744         layout->llot_stripe_size = size;
00745 
00746         return 0;
00747 }
00748 
00758 int llapi_layout_pattern_get(const struct llapi_layout *layout,
00759                              uint64_t *pattern)
00760 {
00761         if (layout == NULL || pattern == NULL ||
00762             layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC) {
00763                 errno = EINVAL;
00764                 return -1;
00765         }
00766 
00767         *pattern = layout->llot_pattern;
00768 
00769         return 0;
00770 }
00771 
00782 int llapi_layout_pattern_set(struct llapi_layout *layout, uint64_t pattern)
00783 {
00784         if (layout == NULL || layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC) {
00785                 errno = EINVAL;
00786                 return -1;
00787         }
00788 
00789         if (pattern != LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT &&
00790             pattern != LLAPI_LAYOUT_RAID0) {
00791                 errno = EOPNOTSUPP;
00792                 return -1;
00793         }
00794 
00795         layout->llot_pattern = pattern;
00796 
00797         return 0;
00798 }
00799 
00813 int llapi_layout_ost_index_set(struct llapi_layout *layout, int stripe_number,
00814                                uint64_t ost_index)
00815 {
00816         if (layout == NULL || layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC ||
00817             !llapi_layout_stripe_index_is_valid(ost_index)) {
00818                 errno = EINVAL;
00819                 return -1;
00820         }
00821 
00822         if (stripe_number != 0) {
00823                 errno = EOPNOTSUPP;
00824                 return -1;
00825         }
00826 
00827         layout->llot_stripe_offset = ost_index;
00828 
00829         return 0;
00830 }
00831 
00844 int llapi_layout_ost_index_get(const struct llapi_layout *layout,
00845                                uint64_t stripe_number, uint64_t *index)
00846 {
00847         if (layout == NULL || layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC ||
00848             stripe_number >= layout->llot_stripe_count ||
00849             index == NULL  || layout->llot_objects_are_valid == 0) {
00850                 errno = EINVAL;
00851                 return -1;
00852         }
00853 
00854         if (layout->llot_objects[stripe_number].l_ost_idx == -1)
00855                 *index = LLAPI_LAYOUT_DEFAULT;
00856         else
00857                 *index = layout->llot_objects[stripe_number].l_ost_idx;
00858 
00859         return 0;
00860 }
00861 
00873 int llapi_layout_pool_name_get(const struct llapi_layout *layout, char *dest,
00874                                size_t n)
00875 {
00876         if (layout == NULL || layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC ||
00877             dest == NULL) {
00878                 errno = EINVAL;
00879                 return -1;
00880         }
00881 
00882         strncpy(dest, layout->llot_pool_name, n);
00883 
00884         return 0;
00885 }
00886 
00896 int llapi_layout_pool_name_set(struct llapi_layout *layout,
00897                                const char *pool_name)
00898 {
00899         char *ptr;
00900 
00901         if (layout == NULL || layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC ||
00902             pool_name == NULL) {
00903                 errno = EINVAL;
00904                 return -1;
00905         }
00906 
00907         /* Strip off any 'fsname.' portion. */
00908         ptr = strchr(pool_name, '.');
00909         if (ptr != NULL)
00910                 pool_name = ptr + 1;
00911 
00912         if (strlen(pool_name) > LOV_MAXPOOLNAME) {
00913                 errno = EINVAL;
00914                 return -1;
00915         }
00916 
00917         strncpy(layout->llot_pool_name, pool_name,
00918                 sizeof(layout->llot_pool_name));
00919 
00920         return 0;
00921 }
00922 
00938 int llapi_layout_file_open(const char *path, int open_flags, mode_t mode,
00939                            const struct llapi_layout *layout)
00940 {
00941         int fd;
00942         int rc;
00943         int tmp;
00944         struct lov_user_md *lum;
00945         size_t lum_size;
00946 
00947         if (path == NULL ||
00948             (layout != NULL && layout->llot_magic != LLAPI_LAYOUT_MAGIC)) {
00949                 errno = EINVAL;
00950                 return -1;
00951         }
00952 
00953         /* Object creation must be postponed until after layout attributes
00954          * have been applied. */
00955         if (layout != NULL && (open_flags & O_CREAT))
00956                 open_flags |= O_LOV_DELAY_CREATE;
00957 
00958         fd = open(path, open_flags, mode);
00959 
00960         if (layout == NULL || fd < 0)
00961                 return fd;
00962 
00963         lum = llapi_layout_to_lum(layout);
00964 
00965         if (lum == NULL) {
00966                 tmp = errno;
00967                 close(fd);
00968                 errno = tmp;
00969                 return -1;
00970         }
00971 
00972         lum_size = lov_user_md_size(0, lum->lmm_magic);
00973 
00974         rc = fsetxattr(fd, XATTR_LUSTRE_LOV, lum, lum_size, 0);
00975         if (rc < 0) {
00976                 tmp = errno;
00977                 close(fd);
00978                 errno = tmp;
00979                 fd = -1;
00980         }
00981 
00982         free(lum);
00983         errno = errno == EOPNOTSUPP ? ENOTTY : errno;
00984 
00985         return fd;
00986 }
00987 
01002 int llapi_layout_file_create(const char *path, int open_flags, int mode,
01003                              const struct llapi_layout *layout)
01004 {
01005         return llapi_layout_file_open(path, open_flags|O_CREAT|O_EXCL, mode,
01006                                       layout);
01007 }
